title: Impurity in NaCl if percent Cl is too large

content.prompt: A sample of a solid labeled as NaCl may be impure. A student analyzes the sample and determines that it contains 75 percent chlorine by mass. Pure NaCl(s) contains 61 percent chlorine by mass. Which of the following statements is consistent with the data?

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
